title: For Rent 837 W 17th St
posting_body: Newly Refinished Spacious Home that has been updated with today's modern colors....
This light filled home is centrally located only a short walk to the new downtown area/public transit and minutes to shopping/Highways!
Home is ready for immediate occupancy with an all new light filled interior that includes cool detail light arched opening, partially finished basement area, deep lot for summer relaxing & more.
Kitchen has been updated and includes appliances.
Min of 1 year lease, background and credit check required, section 8 Accepted ($40 credit/background check fee...waived for section 8 sometimes).
No dangerous breeds deemed by insurance.
Do not miss out on this fantastic rental...Call today for your private tour!
